addr: L.A. Metro Board Room. One Gateway Plaza, 3rd Floor. Los Angeles, CA 90012
title: 2016 California Passenger Rail Summit
desc: Join us at the third annual summit as we meet with leaders in the industry for discussions regarding the modernization and integration of passenger rail service in California, being led by the California State Transportation Agency (CalSTA) and the Federal Railroad Administration (FRA), working with transportation agencies throughout the state, and creating an environment of investment in passenger rail infrastructure that has been unparalleled in recent years and will continue to grow.
